name: My Step Sisters
description:
My step sisters - erotic visual novel, which accommodates all the secret dreams of every guy. In the game you can improve your communication, flirting skills and get to know female nature better.
But a single careless step in communication may ruin the impression about you, which will affect your sexual life.
As is well known, the surest way to every woman's heart is not that simple. That's why, we prepared three mini-games for you. As long as you win you can have any lady you're interested in and enjoy her love.

Distressed guy returns home after being expelled from the university. He feels like a poor loser and doesn't know how to tell everything to his family.
But he meets three gorgeous sisters home, instead of his parents. They’re genuinely supporting the guy and trying to catch up during his absence.
You understand, that huge possibilities of human pleasure are opened for you, but are you smart enough to get them? Show how capable you are and get the fondest wish!

Fearures:
1. Visual novel 2-4 hours long
2. Three mini-games
3. Russian, English translation
4. Five plot endings
5. Musical score

Sisters:
1. Lily- the youngest of the sisters, she is in love with computer games. Her character is soft and responsive. Seems like a fragile and petite girl. Has no experience in communicating with men.
2. Daisy- the middle of the sisters, adores cooking, works as a chief in expensive restaurant. She is in really attractive shape. Loves to fantasize on dirty topics.
3. Rosaline - the eldest sister, real businesswoman. Keeps track of her figure, favorite kind of sport - running.
